sourcesContent:
export const whichMonth = (month) => {
    switch (month) {
        case "01":
            return "Jan"
        case "02":
            return "Fab"
        case "03":
            return "Mar"
        case "04":
            return "Apr"
        case "05":
            return "May"
        case "06":
            return "Jun"
        case "07":
            return "Jul"
        case "08":
            return "Aug"
        case "09":
            return "Sep"
        case "10":
            return "Oct"
        case "11":
            return "Nov"
        case "12":
            return "Dec"
        default:
            return ''
    }
}
